name: Swipe Sushi
description:
This is a version of the popular 2048 game.
The idea comes from wanting to recreate that game mechanic but making it more interesting by putting sushi cards instead of numbers.

HOW TO PLAY:
Press the ARROW KEYS to move the tiles.
Have fun!

All game assets are made by me.
Music and sounds are from freesfx.co

Special thanks go to:
José Pablo, John Martin, Bharon, Yevhen Somochkin, Peppe.
